sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { businessData, industryCategories } from '../data/businessData'; import { formatLocationWithRegion } from '../utils/searchUtils'; /** * BusinessProfilePage component - Detailed view of individual business profiles * Features comprehensive business information with accessible design */ const BusinessProfilePage = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const business = businessData.find(b => b.id === parseInt(id)); // Handle business not found if (!business) { return (
‚ùì

Business Not Found

The business you're looking for doesn't exist or may have been removed.

Back to Directory
); } // Get industry information const industryInfo = industryCategories.find(cat => cat.id === business.industry); const industryIcon = industryInfo?.icon || 'üè¢'; return (
{/* Breadcrumb Navigation */}
Home Directory {business.name}
{/* Business Profile Header */}
{/* Business Icon */}
{industryIcon}
{/* Business Info */}

{business.name}

{formatLocationWithRegion(business.location)}

{business.tagline}

{/* Category Tags */}
{business.categories.primary} ANZSIC: {business.categories.anzsicCode} {business.categories.secondary.map((category, index) => ( {category} ))}
{/* Business Details */}
{/* Main Content */}
{/* Description */}

About This Business

{business.description}

{/* Key Features */}

Key Features & Services

    {business.keyFeatures.map((feature, index) => (
  • {feature}
    • ))}
{/* Service Tags */}

Services & Specialties

{business.tags.services.map((service, index) => ( {service} ))}
{/* Sidebar */}
{/* Quick Info Card */}

Quick Information

Industry
{industryIcon} {industryInfo?.name || business.industry}
Location
{business.location.town}
{business.location.region}, {business.location.state}
Primary Category
{business.categories.primary}
ANZSIC Code
{business.categories.anzsicCode}
{/* Action Buttons */}
{/* Related Businesses */}

Similar Businesses

{businessData .filter(b => b.id !== business.id && (b.industry === business.industry || b.location.state === business.location.state) ) .slice(0, 3) .map((relatedBusiness) => { const relatedIndustryInfo = industryCategories.find(cat => cat.id === relatedBusiness.industry); return (
{relatedIndustryInfo?.icon || 'üè¢'}

{relatedBusiness.name}

{relatedBusiness.location.town}, {relatedBusiness.location.state}

No similar businesses found.

)}

); }; export default BusinessProfilePage;
